item.description:
I went here for the first time about a week and a half ago and was blown away by the quality of the food. I thought that this would make a fun meetup for this group. This restaraunt has a unique menu with many delicious choices (I highly recommend the Lobster Bisque to start, and had the Dr Pepper Braised Short Ribs as the main meal-yummy!)

 

Everything everyone tried was delicious, and I'm dying to try another dish here.

 

Although the website is still under construction, you can view the food and wine menu here:

http://www.chopsandcatch.com/

Shortcut to food menu: http://www.chopsandcatch.com/images/food.pdf

**I've limited the list to 10 people, but will expand the numbers if more want to attend.
item.why: Great food, great atmosphere, and easy to get to.

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Catch some dinner at "Chops N Catch"
